snippet: The more details that are released about the budget sequester scheduled for next year, the worse it looks.
abstract: Editorial holds that the more details that are released about the budget sequester scheduled for 2013, the worse it looks; warns that nearly every government function will be significantly diminished, alongside defense spending; urges Congress to cancel the ham-handed reductions and negotiate a realistic plan to balance spending cuts with tax increases on the rich.
lead_paragraph: The more details that are released about the budget sequester scheduled for next year, the worse it looks.
